localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

previous.excerpt:
Since the Game squeeze has everyone interested in stocks, and the way regular
folks are kept drown by the big money investors, why don't we all band together
to lobby for the elimination of day trading restrictions? 25,000 dollars is just
out of reach enough that most people will not be able to…
previous.title: Lobby for the elimination of pattern day trading rules

localize.title: 游说取消模式化日间交易规则。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
由于游戏的挤压让大家对股票产生了兴趣，而常规的方式
乡亲们都被大户们淹死了，不如大家团结在一起吧
来游说取消日间交易限制？两万五千元只是
遥不可及，大多数人将无法...

localize.title: 遊說取消模式化日間交易規則。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
由於遊戲的擠壓讓大家對股票產生了興趣，而常規的方式
鄉親們都被大戶們淹死了，不如大家團結在一起吧
來遊說取消日間交易限制？兩萬五千元只是
遙不可及，大多數人將無法...
